project.description: Release build of ControlCenter Main Branch - builds code from //depot/main/Destiny/main/...

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x export NLEXTERNALDIR=D:/P4/external export NLEXTERNALDIR2=D:/P4/main_external export JAVA_HOME=${NLEXTERNALDIR2}/j2sdk/jdk1.7.0_71
export DESTINY_OPENAZ_NODEJS_SRC_TREE_ROOT=D:/Jenkins/workspace/source_destiny-openaz-nodejs_Nimbus_8.0.1_OpenAZ_REST export DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT=D:/Jenkins/workspace/source_destiny-ui_Nimbus_saas/ export TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT=D:/Jenkins/workspace/destiny-Nimbus-8.0.2-help-OnPremise/
set +x echo "################################################################################" echo "INFO: Git info about current state of DESTINY_OPENAZ_NODEJS_SRC_TREE_ROOT" echo "INFO: DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT is ${DESTINY_OPENAZ_NODEJS_SRC_TREE_ROOT}" cd ${DESTINY_OPENAZ_NODEJS_SRC_TREE_ROOT}/ git show --quiet HEAD echo "################################################################################"
echo "################################################################################" echo "INFO: Git info about current state of DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT" echo "INFO: DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT is ${DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT}" cd ${DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT}/ git show --quiet HEAD echo "################################################################################"
echo "################################################################################" echo "INFO: Git info about current state of TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT" echo "INFO: TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT is ${TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT}" cd ${TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT}/ git show --quiet HEAD echo "################################################################################" set -x
cd ${WORKSPACE} source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
## EOF ##
